title: 开发mod出现异常
author: 玄月月
txt_content:
无法正常运行
==========================================================
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:

replies.author: nakido
replies.txt_content: zcblock.java 第24行造成了空指针异常呗（如果这个xymod是你写的mod的话）

replies.author: 玄月月
replies.txt_content:
nakido 发表于 2019-11-18 21:49
zcblock.java 第24行造成了空指针异常呗（如果这个xymod是你写的mod的话）
忘记了一行代码没写上导致空指针，下载没问题了
